ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
ChiantiPy is the Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical
spectroscopy. It provides the capability to calculate the emission line and
continuum spectrum of an optically thin plasma based on the data in the
CHIANTI database.
about.summary: a Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical spectroscopy

about.description:
ChiantiPy is the Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical
spectroscopy. It provides the capability to calculate the emission line and
continuum spectrum of an optically thin plasma based on the data in the
CHIANTI database.
about.summary: a Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical spectroscopy

name: chiantipy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ChiantiPy" %}
{% set version = "0.15.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/chianti-atomic/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c8d8f7a4a0bce01f614ba41162583c7244c8cc54c7f94fbeb3901ce671eea33c

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - ipyparallel
    - matplotlib
    - pyqt

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - ChiantiPy

about:
  home: https://github.com/chianti-atomic/ChiantiPy
  summary: a Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical spectroscopy
  license: ISC
  license_file: licenses/LICENSE
  description: |
    ChiantiPy is the Python interface to the CHIANTI atomic database for astrophysical 
    spectroscopy. It provides the capability to calculate the emission line and 
    continuum spectrum of an optically thin plasma based on the data in the 
    CHIANTI database.
  doc_url: https://chiantipy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/chianti-atomic/ChiantiPy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - epassaro
